```{r}
df <- tibble(raw_data = str_split(data, "\n")[[1]]) |>
  slice(2:(n() - 1)) |> 
  mutate(raw_data = str_sub(raw_data, start = 12)) |> 
  separate(raw_data, into = c("Time", "Temp"), sep = " - ") |> 
  mutate(Temp = as.numeric(Temp)) |> 
  mutate(Time = as.POSIXct(Time, format = "%H:%M:%S"))
```

```{r}
plot <- df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = Time, y = Temp)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_datetime(
    date_labels = "%H:%M:%S",                  # Format for time display
    breaks = seq(min(data$Time), max(data$Time), by = "3 sec") # Custom breaks every 3 seconds
  )


ggsave("temperature_vs_time.png", plot = plot, width = 6, height = 4, dpi = 300)
```
